name: Poopie race
description:
Pitch :

Jean-Yves had some shrimps in the Oostend market... rookie mistake. Help him to find his way to the nearest toilet before the unavoidable disaster. Race your way through the people and do not forget to save your energy, otherwise… it could be fecal.

Infos:

Jauge manquante de 5 malus (dépassé les 5, c'est le game over)

Double jump : malus +1
Se prendre un obstacle : +1
PQ : malus -1
Immodium : malus -3 
Win : atteindre la cathy cabine  (available one day)

(y a pas de game over non plus parce que perdre c'est triste)
